item.title: Rubbish dumped 7 july, 7th July
item.description:
Rubbish is being dumped on a daily basis by from the Chinese ‘see you again’ to the next door property. They need to be fined or forced to clean up the streets themselves it’s getting worse now the are doing work on the property a few doors up ‘G.O.A.T’

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London

item.title: Rubbish dump - 6-7 July, 7th July
item.description:
